overview:
Dean Frerker has served as chief financial officer of Knowledge Anywhere since October 2000. Dean oversees all Knowledge Anywhere operations outside of sales and marketing and is responsible for shaping cost-control and profit growth strategies for the organization.

Dean’s extensive accounting career covers more than 20 years. Prior to joining Knowledge Anywhere Dean worked for Attachmate Corporation as group financial controller. As group financial controller, he was responsible for planning, reporting and financial analysis for the Enterprise Products Consulting Services Group, representing over $250 million in revenue.
